creator: slkraghav@gmail.com
text:
Many of the log4j classes lack proper documentation in the API.
Below is the example

http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/apidocs/index.html

Could you be more specific about the issues.  The link is the entry-point into the log4j documentation, classes are only listed by name in the navigation, there is no class documentation when first navigating to this link.  

It would be good to add package documentation for the org.apache.log4j.lf5 packages.  Those packages are from the deprecated LogFactor5 logging analysis application, but there is nothing to let you know that in the doc.  

But since you specifically said class documentation, maybe you meant something else.  If so, please identify the classes.
creator: carnold@apache.org
